meanings.sent1: The professor will praelect on the history of art tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She praelects on various topics at the university.
meanings.sent3: During the boring praelect, some students fell asleep.
meanings.sent4: Her words praelect like a gentle stream, soothing and informative.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's praelecting style captivated the students' attention.

meanings.sent1: I attended an interesting praelect on astronomy last night.
meanings.sent2: The praelect was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The praelect turned out to be more entertaining than I expected.
meanings.sent4: His praelect was a beacon of knowledge in the sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The praelect left a lasting impression on the audience.
